## Seating & Set-up
1. Please make sure that you sit next to your group members for the rest of the quarter.
2. Please set-up your computer as normal.

## Stadia Maps
1. Make an account with [Stadia Maps](https://client.stadiamaps.com/signup/).  
2. You need to add a "property" which is just a name for your project.  
3. Once you have an account, you can get an API key.  
4. You will need the key today to use the maps.  

## Group project Check-in
1. You should have settled on the data you plan to use.  
2. Who is doing what? Make sure everyone has a job to do.  
3. Keep your code updated in your repository.  
4. If you are stuck, please see us for help.
